about_the_game:
BBQ Simulator: The Squad Demo lets you enjoy a fun barbecue party experience with your friends. With flying meats and crazy challenges, you can prepare your own grill and cook delicious dishes. Whether you play solo or with up to 8 friends in multiplayer mode, this experience is sure to be a blast! If you’re in the mood for a relaxed barbecue, you can play through simple scenarios, or if you’re up for a challenge, dive into competitive modes where things get wild and meats start flying!

In this demo, you’ll need to prepare meals for all the hungry players and make sure they’re fed. You can work together with your friends by sharing tasks: while one preps the grill, another can set the table. But watch out—weather conditions can be challenging, and flies will try to steal your meat!



Key Features:

  • Multiplayer co-op mode allows you to team up with up to 8 players for crazy barbecue sessions. You’re free to share tasks as you like.

  • Avatar customization lets you create your own character with detailed options.

  • Enemy flies will try to steal your meat, so be prepared to defend your barbecue!

  • Garden activities: Enjoy games like football, basketball, and more while someone else handles the grilling.

  • Kitchen use: Utilize the microwave to feed your friends before they pass out, or get creative with your cooking solutions. Just make sure the microwave doesn’t explode!

  • Valuable meats: Cook and prepare them without waste; environmental conditions can be tough.

  • Use tools like the blowtorch and fire extinguisher to add more excitement to your barbecue adventure!

content_descriptors.notes:
While customize the character, you can remove the character's clothes such as t-shirts and pants, but you can never remove all the clothes.

Also contains cartoon level violence and humor.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: BBQ Simulator: The Squad Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 with 3,1 GHz or AMD FX-8150 with 3,6 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 460 (2 GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 with 3,6 GHz or AMD FX-8350 with 4,0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (4 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (4 GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: BBQ Simulator: The Squad Demo offers a fun barbecue party experience with various challenges. In this demo, you will need to feed your friends with well-cooked meat before they faint from hunger. You can enjoy this experience in single-player mode or multiplayer mode with up to 8 friends.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
